# Logisim PLA program table

#   I    F  C |RHCCCRRRRRR A AIAAMMMO
#   N    L  T |SLEOLABCABC O ORRRAIOE
#   S    G    |TT   IIIOOO P  IIOI
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * Base
xxxxxxxxxxx000 0001000000000000001000
xxxxxxxxxxx001 0010000000000001000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * NOP
00000000xxx010 0000000000000000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * ADD
00000001xxx010 0000000100000010000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * SUB
00000010xxx010 0000000100000110000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * MUL
00000011xxx010 0000000100001010000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * DIV
00000100xxx010 0000000100001110000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * LDA
00000101xxx010 0001000000000000001000
00000101xxx011 0010000000000000100010
00000101xxx100 0000000000000000011000
00000101xxx101 0000010000000000000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * LDB
00000110xxx010 0001000000000000001000
00000110xxx011 0010000000000000100010
00000110xxx100 0000000000000000011000
00000110xxx101 0000001000000000000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * LDC
00000111xxx010 0001000000000000001000
00000111xxx011 0010000000000000100010
00000111xxx100 0000000000000000011000
00000111xxx101 0000000100000000000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * SVA
00001000xxx010 0001000000000000001000
00001000xxx011 0010000000000000100010
00001000xxx100 0000000000000000011000
00001000xxx101 0000000010000000000100
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * SVB
00001001xxx010 0001000000000000001000
00001001xxx011 0010000000000000100010
00001001xxx100 0000000000000000011000
00001001xxx101 0000000001000000000100
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * SVC
00001010xxx010 0001000000000000001000
00001010xxx011 0010000000000000100010
00001010xxx100 0000000000000000011000
00001010xxx101 0000000000100000000100
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * MAB
00001011xxx010 0000001010000000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * MAC
00001100xxx010 0000000110000000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * MBA
00001101xxx010 0000010001000000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * MBC
00001110xxx010 0000000101000000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * MCA
00001111xxx010 0000010000100000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * MCB
00010000xxx010 0000001000100000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * JMP
00010001xxx010 0001000000000000001000
00010001xxx011 0000100000000000000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * CMP
00010010xxx010 0000000000010000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * JEQ
00010011010010 0001000000000000001000
00010011010011 0000100000000000000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * JNE
00010100x0x010 0001000000000000001000
00010100x0x011 0000100000000000000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * JBT
00010101100010 0001000000000000001000
00010101100011 0000100000000000000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * JLT
00010110001010 0001000000000000001000
00010110001011 0000100000000000000010
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * OUT
00010111xxx010 0001000000000000001000
00010111xxx011 0010000000000000100010
00010111xxx100 0000000000000000011000
00010111xxx101 0000000000000000000011
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * RST
11111110xxx010 1000000000000000000000
#*******   *** **   ***   *** ***   * HLT
11111111xxx010 0100000000000000000000
